# SimpleNS Documentation - LLM Crawling Information
# https://llmstxt.org/

# Title: SimpleNS - Simple Notification System
# Description: SimpleNS is a self-hosted, open-source notification infrastructure for sending emails, SMS, push notifications, and more.

## Overview
SimpleNS is a scalable, self-hosted notification system that provides:
- Multi-channel notifications (Email, SMS, Push, Discord, Slack, WhatsApp)
- Plugin-based architecture for extensibility
- Delayed and scheduled notifications
- Retry mechanisms with exponential backoff
- Real-time status tracking and webhooks
- Dashboard for monitoring and management

## Documentation Sections

### Core
- /docs/core - Core documentation index
- /docs/core/getting-started - Getting started guide
- /docs/core/configuration - Configuration options
- /docs/core/core-concepts - Core concepts and architecture
- /docs/core/api-reference - API Reference
- /docs/core/architecture - System architecture
- /docs/core/admin-dashboard - Admin dashboard guide
- /docs/core/self-hosting - Self-hosting guide
- /docs/core/local-development - Local development setup
- /docs/core/troubleshooting - Troubleshooting guide

### SDKs
- /docs/sdk - SDK documentation index
- /docs/sdk/api-reference - SDK API Reference
- /docs/sdk/building-plugin - Building custom plugins
- /docs/sdk/manifest - Plugin manifest documentation
- /docs/sdk/plugin-interface - Plugin interface reference
- /docs/sdk/schemas - Schema definitions
- /docs/sdk/utilities - SDK utilities

### Plugins
- /docs/plugins - Available plugins and documentation
